German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): [tsuˈfʁiːdn̩], [tsuˈfʁiːdən]
  • Audio
    		(file)

Adjective[edit]

zufrieden (comparative zufriedener, superlative am zufriedensten)

  1. content, satisfied

Declension[edit]
